item.title: About
item.description: My name is Lukas Gienapp and I am a Masters student and Research Assistant at the TEMIR group at Leipzig University. I am passionate about all things in Text Mining and Data Science. Professional Experience since 2019, Text Mining & Retrieval Group, Leipzig University Research Assistant 2017-2019, Institute for Sociology, Leipzig University Student Assistant 2017-2019, Institute for Translatology, Leipzig University Student Assistant Publications2021 Alexander Bondarenko, Lukas Gienapp, Maik Fr√∂be, Meriem Beloucif, Yamen Ajjour, Alexander Panchenko, Chris Biemann, Benno Stein, Henning Wachsmuth, Martin Potthast, and Matthias Hagen.

item.title: Markdown Features
item.description: This is a quick demonstration post. It serves as an example of the features of this theme. FormattingBlockquotesSome blockquotes. But first, we try to manually cite via This is between cite tags and has math: \(e^x \) This is a blockquote with two paragraphs, that employs the markdowns > blockquoting.
